description: This source file defines a utility object 'SplitUtils' that provides a method to split a string into tokens based on spaces and stores the tokens in a custom LinkedList class. It includes internal helper methods for validating tokens before adding them to the list.

classes.name: SplitUtils
classes.description: A utility object providing string splitting functionality.

methods.name: split
methods.description: Splits a string into tokens based on spaces, returning a LinkedList of tokens.

methods.name: addIfValid
methods.description: Adds the token to the list if it is valid.

methods.name: isTokenValid
methods.description: Checks if a token is non-empty and valid.
